channel.title: F.E.A.R- Review
channel.description:
I got the game and its pretty scary :P
Its based around this guy, who goes crazy and kills alot of people. There is a little girl called ulma, she messes with people's heads. During game play, you may see her walk around,it really scares the shit out of you.
f.e.a.r stands for
First Encounter Assault Recon
basically it is an operations unit of the government, to track down and kill supernatural phenomanun.
Multiplayer KICKS ASS. You dont even have to port forward your router to host....
In game-play, you have extremely fast reflexes. You may actually slow down time, this gives you a very good advantage when you are stuck in tight situations. The game is very gory :) i actually close ranged some dude with a shotgun and bits of his flesh came out o.0
Anyway, i suggest buying fear, the campaign is EXTREMELY good, not to mention the multiplayer
Multiplayer is FREE to everybody
www.joinfear.com
This is james reporting :P.

item.title: F.E.A.R- Review
item.dc:creator: @Steelsword Steelsword
item.description:
@Steelsword wrote:

F.E.A.R is probly the best FPS game ive ever played. Its kreepy as hell and has a great FPS system. RLY fun slowing down time and pwning eveyone in the room with a shotgun shell in the face

Read full topic

item.description:

Looks cool, I will check it out.
